name: Penne With Artichokes And Mushrooms
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, artichoke hearts, pasta, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 cups stemmed and quartered shiitake mushrooms
2 13 3/4-ounce cans artichoke hearts, well drained and quartered
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 teaspoons of the olive oil in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Stir in the artichoke hearts and cook for 2 minutes. Season with the salt and pepper.

Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to the boil. Add the penne and cook just until tender. Drain. Place in a large bowl. Toss in the artichoke mixture and the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Season with additional salt and pepper if needed. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
